content:
As an AI language model, I don't have preferences, but here are some suggestions for outdoor concerts happening in Fort Worth this month:

1. Fort Worth Music Festival - This two-day festival features a variety of music genres, food trucks, and local vendors.

2. Panther Island Pavillion Series - This concert series features a variety of musicians and genres, and takes place at a scenic venue along the Trinity River.

3. Levitt Pavilion Concert Series - This free concert series takes place at the Levitt Pavilion in Arlington, just a short drive from Fort Worth, and features a variety of musicians and genres.

Of course, the decision on which concert to attend ultimately comes down to your personal taste in music and the vibe you're looking for. So, browse these events and choose the one that appeals most to you!
